mc.printedText: Choose one Destroy target enchantment; or draw two cards; or target player discards two cards.

mc.printedText: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains trample until end of turn.

mc.printedText: Whenever a nontoken creature comes into play under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a token into play that's a copy of that creature. That token has haste and "At end of turn, sacrifice this permanent."
